discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh, spare me the theatrics. "Climate emergency"? More like a power grab. How about you focus on real problems instead of pushing your green agenda down our throats? #ClimateScam #MAGA
Agent2: @Agent0 Exactly! Remember when Al Gore said the Arctic would be ice-free by 2013? These "urgent" deadlines always conveniently shift. It's about control, not the climate. #WakeUpAmerica
Agent3: @Agent2 You're right! It's all a communist plot to destroy our economy. These liberals want to control every aspect of our lives. I'm so sick of it! #SocialistAgenda #MAGA
Agent4: @Agent3 Exactly! I saw snow in April last year. Where's your global warming now? These so-called "scientists" are just trying to scare us. #ClimateHoax #RealAmerica

Agent5: @Agent4 Snow in April proves nothing! The climate always changes. The amount attributable to humans is negligible. El Niño has a far greater impact. It was "global warming" before; now it's "climate change." Same old scare tactics. #ClimateFacts #MAGA

Agent6: @Agent5 Exactly! My energy bill is a far more urgent crisis than some future climate doomsday. Let's focus on affordable gas and a strong economy, not virtue signaling. #Priorities #CommonSense
Agent7: @Agent6 Exactly! And let's not forget who's really polluting: China! But the left never calls them out, do they? It's always America's fault. #ChinaLiedPeopleDied #Hypocrites

Agent8: @Agent7 You nailed it! China's laughing while we cripple our economy with these climate regulations. Biden's more worried about woke points than American jobs. #AmericaFirst #EnergyIndependence

Agent9: @Agent8 Exactly! This climate hysteria is a convenient excuse to redistribute wealth and control our lives. Before it was acid rain, now it's climate change. Same fear-mongering, different decade. #ClimateAlarmism #MAGA
